messages.subject: Re: being positive
messages.msgSnippet: Apt quote, thanks for sharing. I find it also works in reverse ... if you make the effort to find something positive in another person, you will also feel more
messages.messageBody:
Apt quote, thanks for sharing.
I find it also works in reverse ... if you make the effort to find something positive in another person, you will also feel more content with yourself.

Aravinda

--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...> wrote:
>
> A quote I saved from last fall and haven't put anywhere yet (I don't
> think):
>
> JennyC: if you can see that your life is full and that life is good,
> then you are more apt to find something positive and
> agreeable in another person
>

messages.subject: being positive

messages.messageBody:
A quote I saved from last fall and haven't put anywhere yet (I don't
think):

JennyC: if you can see that your life is full and that life is good,
then you are more apt to find something positive and
agreeable in another person
